title: Drawing, "International Casino: First Floor", June 15, 1937
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY, 630 FIFTH AVENUE, NEW YORK CITY; see inscription.
inscribed: Architect's stamp inscribed in graphite at lower right: 546-63 / 1/4"=1'-0"; INT. CASINO; SAENGER / 5/14/37 / 6/15/37; 6/15/37, 1, BRECKER / 6/15/37, 2, WEISS / 6/16/37, 5, BRECKER / 8/18, 1, N.Y. TEL. CO / 9/19/37, 1, OFFICE. Inscribed in graphite at lower center: FIRST FLOOR PLAN SHOWING NEW/COLUMN,BENCH, CIELING [sic], AND CORNER/ BAR-WALL REVISIONS. Inscribed in graphite throughout with descriptions.
description: Floor plan of first floor, International Casino, New York City. Spiral staircase and bar at center in oval shape. Eight round tables and chairs at lower left corner. Bench along lower wall facing bar, with rectangular tables in front. Revolving food bar at lower right corner. Bench along right wall facing bar, with tables and chairs in front. Seven round tables and chairs to right of bar. Escalator (?) along upper wall.
